body: Hi Leland, Thank you for updating the file. It definitely helps. I removed the conversation numbers inside the component (line 215 in gencumulativesky) and generated the sky only for diffuse values. Now you can see the bounds are gone. Try the attached file and let me know if it addresses your concerns. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*E1*lxSss-dHYuPkjA5MUf7-lyHEe3wqUnhUsw13bu-npmyR9Onc0y9j0Egskz9kOj6nnavqgQTz-*qW0fJ-SuGKl*-4K1Ni/diffuseSkySameStradianAngle._2png.png) PS: I didn't update the legend so it is kwh/m2.str
